description: DAMA for Riding Mowers (E60HS 18 MOWR B)
full_summary:
# Request for Supply Arrangement (RFX) No. WS4157474176

**English**
## Request for Supply Arrangement (RFX)
### Title: Riding Mowers (E60HS 18MOWR B)
#### Description
Canada is seeking to establish Supply Arrangements (SAs) to procure riding mowers in accordance with Annex A - Purchase Description. This RFX aims to establish pre-qualified suppliers who will be allowed to submit bids for individual Request for Proposals.

### Key Dates
- **Publication Date:** August 23, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** November 3, 2026, at 2:00 p.m. EDT
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
- **Expected Contract End Date:** None

### Solicitation and Evaluation
- **Solicitation Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
- **Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price
- **Evaluation Method:** All arrangements submitted under this RFX will be evaluated by Canada. Responsive arrangements will be recommended for issuance of a supply arrangement (SA). Only suppliers who have been pre-qualified and have been awarded an SA will be allowed to submit bids for individual Request for Proposals.

### Trade Agreements
- This RFX aligns with the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

### Contact Information
- **Name:** Daniel Martial
- **Email:** daniel.martial@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Organization:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Additional Information
- **Regions of Opportunity:** None
- **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
